variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 3.35% on the portion of income up to $79,950. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 6.60% on the portion of income over $79,950 up to $193,300. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 7.60% on the portion of income over $193,300 up to $294,600. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 8.75% on the portion of income over $294,600. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_4 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all four brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
